attributes.action: I want to stop Mobile Phone companies ripping customers off in the UK
attributes.additional_details: I can provide adjudicators decision saying that Vodafone knew full well they mis-sold me but it apparently was my problem that I was not aware (because they didn't tell me) that I had to self manage my account online - I know of 3 other instances of pensioners being ripped off, people being denied mortgages etc because these multi billionaire companies have the power to do this to us - needs to stop - they need to tell buyers the truth
attributes.background: Having been mis-sold a contract and confirmed by CISAS I still need to pay nearly £400 and my credit is affected by Vodafone - know of countless others blacklisted by similar for mortgages etc through mis-selling and no accountability

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition calling for a new law requiring mis-sold contracts to be removed from credit checks if that is something you would like to see happen.
